eewa athara pa්ramukha we.loka maha sanga්rama deka athara jarmaniya,ithaliya ha spanynyaya athu`tha yuropa ratawala pathira giya fasistwadi ha nasiwadi kuriru sanga්ramayanhi wedanakari athdakim donkaraya thawamath yuropa wasiyan athara pawathi.ese wuwada amerikanu sadhakayada mehidi wadath balawath sadhakayak wu bawa pahadili we.yuropaya sanwidhanayak bawata pathkota eyata amerikan aadhara labadima thuulin mu`tha yuropayama amarikawe sewanalla yatathata ganimata upayamargaya mehidi ka්riyathmaka wu bawa pahadiliya.

madhumadhawi: perakadoruwo perakadoru porak onna - thama nawathama riyen pamina usawiye idiripitadi - bahinna haduwa dora ariya pamani ane - roda dahaate thadiyek dora galawan giya neda - widuli wegayen perakadoruwa kopen - ka gasuwa wiyaru wati asala sitiya poliskarayek kandawuwa balanawa mage alutha gaththu - koti pahaka wahanaye dorata karapu de ara giya - kalakanniya poliskaraya emawita - hondahati ohudesa balala perakadoruwek noweda - oba yayi asuwa ow ow mama ehema thama - eeka nemeyi me balanawa mage watina wahanayata - aru karapu de polis karaya nawathath - me minisa desa balala anukampawen wage - mehema kiyanawa perakadoru obala gana - hari kanagatuyi apahata depala saha mudal ganama - oba wadawenne balanna obe wam atha na - eekath galawila gihin ee gana oba hata na nowa - kisima hangimak perakadoruwa emawita - ithiriwu atha hise gasa mage roleks eka ayiyo - berihan dunna thawath perakadoru porak - niwadu gathakaranu pinisa gambada thanayamakata - puruduwa sitiya ehi himikaruge diyaniya - hada wada yuwathiyak nisa aya ha dadi hadakamak - athiwi thibuna warak mese ehi piwisi - nawatha aawe wasarakinya ee wanawita age ukule - daruweku sitiya thaman meyata wagakiwayuthu - bawa dath perakadoruwa tharuniyagen ee gana melesin wimasanawa ayi lamayo mata nokiwwe - apita bandinnath thibunane daruwata mage wasagamath - dennata thibuna ewita ayada pilithuru lesa - me gana noma danumdenna hethu kimada yanna mese - pahadili keruwa daruwa labena bawa danagath - ape pawule hama denama eka thanakata ekathuwela - kathika keruwa perakadoruwek pawulata - ek wenawata wada hondayi awajathakayek sitima - thiranaya wuna (agathiyen thorawayi.
yuropiya gawa wisheshaye sirure hadaya apara desata yath ma palal wana athara hasirima udasina ya.

shri lanka krikat-dayalog anugrahaya 2020 thek dirgha karayi shri lanka jathika krikat kandayama sandaha nila anugrahakathwaya dakwana shri lankawe pramukhathama sanniwedana sewa sampadaka dayalog aasiaata samagama 2020 marthu masaya dakwa jathika krikat kandayama sahabhagi wana deshiya saha wideshiya tharaga sandaha dayalog sawibalaya laba dimata piyawara gena thibe.
“man hithanne oba apata wisheshayak kirima sadharana naha.”
mamanam hithanne me wage ayadumpath nokandawa, swadhina mandalayak wisin, ape blog adawi nirikshanaya kara, honda naraka dekama penwamin, kisiyam agayimak karanawanam hondayi kiyalayi.
somathilaka jayamaha mahathmayage hama githayakama wage gambauru therumak thiyenawa.

ekathu kara ganne prathiwadiyagen kastiya kadala nisa ee hama kenama saththiyak.
sewakayan athara aththe ekineka kapa ganna mlechcha tharagayak nowa sahodarathmaka tharagayaki.

mahinda hamuduruwo unna nam aaye tibet yayida, ekko rawiraj wage wedi thiyagena mareyida kiyanna nam danne na.
wana wijayabahu raja wisin thama aganuwara washayen thora ganna ladi.
thisarage nayakathwayen yuth shri lanka kandayama ada indiyawa samanga ekdina tharaga bime
nawakathawe aramunu gana sarachchandra mema adahasa liyana wita amarasekarage mul kalina kruthi liya awasan.

wathman janapathi palanaya aarambhawimata prathama merata aagamika sanhindiyawa bindawati thibunu bawath elesa kriya kala piris ada merata aagamika sanhindiyawa pilibanda wartha sakasima wihiluwata karunak bawath unwahanse kiha.merata warthamanaye pawathna jathika ha aagamika sanhindiyawa winasha karannata wiwidha jathyanthara sanwidhana katayuthu diyath karana bawath, patu deshapalanika aramunu dina ganima sandaha ema sanwidhana wala iththan wi hitapu nayakayin rata asthawara kirimata katayuthu kirima sawoma ekwi parajaya kala yuthu bawath dhammananda himiyo prakasha kalaha.rajapaksha palanayata pera palana samayanhidi bhikshun wahanseta aagam panath parlimenthuwata genaeemata siduwu bawath in nonawathi sanghaya wahanse deshapalanayatada prawishta wu bawath pawasu unwahanse eekala merata aagamika sanhindiyawa barapathala lesa binda wati thibunu bawa kawuruth danna sathyayak bawada kiha.jiniwa samuluwa pawathwena kalasimawa thula rata kisiyam arbudakari thaththwayakata muhuna demin sitiyadi jathyanthara kumanthranakaruwange meheyawima matha sidu kerena mewani wadapiliwela nisa samastha ratawasiyama anathurudayaka thaththwayakata ada watena bawada unwahanse pawasuha.pera an kawaradatath wada aagamika sanhindiyawak ada rate pawathina bawada dhammananda himiyo kiha..
